tool_description: Get information on all your favorite celebrities. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/celebrity.
name: Celebrity by API-Ninjas
title: Celebrity by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/celebrity

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the celebrity you wish to search. This field is case-insensitive.

optional_parameters.name: min_height
optional_parameters.description: Minimum height of celebrities in meters (e.g. **1.65**).

optional_parameters.name: nationality
optional_parameters.description: Nationality of celebrities. Must be an ISO 3166 Alpha-2 country code (e.g. **US**).

optional_parameters.name: max_height
optional_parameters.description: Maximum height of celebrities in meters (e.g. **1.80**).
